Reviews.Title: Good camera, good system
Reviews.Author: Carmelo Pena-gomez
Reviews.Content: I've had the whole 2 camera-monitor set and had problems with one after 5 months of use, They sent me a replacement and works fine. Only bad thing is at night moving objects are not clear. A moving person looks like a ghost. A moving car looks like a space ship from Star Wars. Signal gets weak sometimes and one camera can lose signal for up to 30 minutes. But overall is a good system, keeps lurkers away scared and keep my house safe.

Reviews.Title: I Did Not Like it
Reviews.Author: Paul H. Harrison
Reviews.Content: Maybe this thing would work for some people but not for me. I could only view one camera at a time. The distance was not long enough for my needs I had to return it.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: D. BIELAT "spaz61"
Reviews.Content: I needed 2 more cameras for the security system and these fit the bill. They work great! This really is a plug and play set-- once you have the screen and a mini sd card.

ProductInfo.Features:
Weatherproof (Ip54) Color Camera (Cmos) For Indoor & Outdoor Uses
Increased Range Of Transmission Up To 200 Ft Between Walls & Up To 490 Ft In Clear Line Of Sight
No Wi-Fi Interference & No Interference From Crowded Analog 900 MHZ/2.4 GHZ/5.8 GHZ/6 Hz Devices
Camera With Built-In Ir Leds For Night Vision Up To 30 Ft (B/W)
ProductInfo.Name: Securityman Add-On Digital Indoor/Outdoor Wireless Camera With Night Vision and Audio SM-816DT
